meanings.definition: Having a particular taste or flavor.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream was flavored with vanilla.
meanings.sent2: The soup had a delicious flavored broth.
meanings.sent3: The flavored popcorn made the movie night more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was flavored with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The air was flavored with the scent of blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: To add a particular taste or flavor to something.
meanings.sent1: She flavored the salad with a tangy dressing.
meanings.sent2: He always flavors his coffee with a hint of cinnamon.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally flavored the cake with salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: His words were flavored with sarcasm and wit.
meanings.sent5: The music was flavored with a touch of nostalgia.
